channel.title: As apposed to many noobs im in need of pointing
channel.description: in the right direction. i dont want you to tell me how if you dont want. i know how to code the basics. well im working on trading glitches and duping right now on my server. and im stuck idk how to fix two types of tradng dupes and scams. one where you accept it and right click the item fast. (scam) and the other where both players accept. accept again but then decline real quick and you both get the item. any ideas?
